hero.title: Dragon Biztrip
hero.subtitle: Your reliable partner in organizing business trips to China

visas.title: Visa Support
visas.text: Processing all types of visas to China, including business visas and business trip visas

tours.title: Business Tours
tours.text: Organization of business trips, including transfer, accommodation and support

meetings.title: Meeting Organization

experience.title: Experience
experience.text: Over 10 years of experience in organizing business trips

content.welcomeText: Your reliable partner in business travel organization and visa processing! We specialize in assisting Chinese businessmen looking to expand their horizons in Russia, India and Romania. Dragon Biztrip offers professional and affordable services for business trips organization and visa processing for Russia, India, Vietnam and Schengen visas.
benefits: Legality and reliability: We comply with all legal regulations and provide guarantees for our services.
Wide opportunities: We assist not only with visas but also with company formation in Russia, India, Romania and EU countries.
Extensive experience: Our team has significant experience in business trips and visa processing.
Personal approach: Customized solutions for each client.
Comprehensive services: From visa support to full trip organization.

visaProcessing.title: Visa Processing
visaProcessing.description: We understand that the visa application process can be complicated. Our experience and deep knowledge of legislation will help you quickly and without unnecessary costs obtain visas for Russia, India or Vietnam. We guarantee compliance with all legal norms, providing support at every stage.

businessTrips.title: Business Trips
businessTrips.description: We organize business trips according to all your requirements. With extensive contacts in the mentioned countries, we can help you establish necessary connections. Without language barriers and with attention to details, your trip will be maximally productive.

businessConsultations.title: Business Consultations
businessConsultations.description: We'll help you understand the specifics of doing business in new countries and suggest optimal solutions for your business.

cta.title: Join Our Satisfied Clients
cta.text: Discover new opportunities with Dragon Biztrip. Contact us for a consultation to discuss your needs in detail.

tours.title: Business Tours to China
items: Organization of business trips to China

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Dragon Biztrip is a company specializing in organizing business trips and visa processing for Chinese businessmen. Our mission is to make the process of international business interaction as simple and efficient as possible.

history.title: Company History
history.text: Founded in 2023, Dragon Biztrip quickly gained client trust through our professional approach and deep understanding of international business specifics. We help Chinese entrepreneurs successfully develop their business in Russia, India, and European Union countries.

advantages.title: Our Advantages
items: Professional team with years of experience
Deep knowledge of different countries' legislation
